title.rendered: How to Watch Yeti Junior World Finals 2022 on The Cowboy Channel+

content.rendered:
The Junior World Finals begins Dec. 1 in accordance with the Wrangler NFR Las Vegas, and you can watch it for FREE on the The Cowboy Channel+!

There is no subscription needed to watch the World Finals live from the Wrangler Rodeo Arena! All you have to do to watch is download The Cowboy Channel+ on any mobile device.

Junior World Finals Schedule

BAREBACK/SADDLE BRONC RIDING:

December 1-4, 12 PM PST

Finals: December 5, 11:30 AM PST

POLE BENDING:

December 6-9, 8:00 AM PST

Finals: December 10, 8:30 AM PST

BARREL RACING:

Ages 13-17: December 6 & 8, 8:00 AM PST

Finals: December 10, 10:00 AM PST

Ages 12 & Under: December 7 & 9, 8:00 AM PST

Finals: December 10, 8:30 AM PST

BULL RIDING:

December 1-4, 9:00 AM PST

Finals: December 5, 9:00 AM PST

STEER WRESTLING:

December 6-9, 11:15 AM PST

Finals: December 10, 11:30 AM PST

TEAM ROPING:

December 6-9, 12:30 AM PST

Finals: December 10, 1:00 PM PST

TIE-DOWN ROPING:

12 & Under: December 7, 3:00 PM PST

15 & Under: December 8, 2:00 PM PST

19 & Under: December 9, 2:00 PM PST

Finals: December 10, 2:30 PM PST

BREAKAWAY ROPING:

10 & Under Boys & Girls: December 6, 2:00 PM PST

15 & Under Girls: December 7, 2:00 PM PST

19 & Under Girls: December 8, 3:00 PM PST

Finals: December 10, 2:30 PM PST
